description: This file implements a service class `NotesService` that provides CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) and search functionalities for notes in a note-taking application, interfacing with a backend database through the Supabase client.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: A service class that provides methods for CRUD operations and searching notes in a database using Supabase.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes, optionally filtering by a search term (case-insensitive search on title and content), ordered by most recent update.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its unique ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the specified title and content, setting timestamps for creation and update.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new title and content, and updates the timestamp.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by ID.
